com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone
Class Ringtone

java.lang.Object
  com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone.Ringtone
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Ringtone>
public class Ringtone
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Ringtone>

This class defines a ringtone. This keeps track of all the important META data, can play itself, and also is capable of reading in or parsing itself into XML

Author:
Tydiz

Ringtone

public Ringtone(java.lang.String artist,
                java.lang.String filePath,
                java.lang.String title,
                int fileID,
                boolean isRingtone)
Constructor - Creates a class that allows classification of ringtones

Parameters:
artist - - Music artist of the ringtone
filePath - - Path in the file system that this ringtone exists
title - - Name of the ringtone
isRingtone - - Boolean that expresses if this is a ringtone of a music file
